title: # 343 - Mike "Cowhead" Calta, Mark Normand, Shane Torres, & ME
description:
Today I sit down on the road with Mike "Cowhead" Calta, Mark Normand, & Shane Torres to talk about fighting, comedy, my European tour, getting robbed, Mark's legal problems and much more! 

This episode is brought to you by Leesa Mattresses. Try 100 nights risk free and get 15% off of a Leesa Mattress by going to www.leesa.com/bertcast and use the promo code “Bertcast”

This episode is also brought to you by Cheers Health. Go to www.cheershealth.com and use the promo code “Bertcast” at checkout for 10% off and a free gift for your first order.

This episode is also brought to you by Calm. Get 25% off of a Calm premium subscription by going to www.calm.com/bert

This episode is also brought to you by Zip Recruiter. Try Zip Recruiter for free today by going to www.ziprecruiter.com/bertcast  

This episode is also brought to you by Hims. A one stop shop for hair loss, skincare, sexual wellness, for men. Get your first month for just $5 when you go to www.forhims.com/bertcasted

The Body Shots Fall Tour is on pre sale now! Use the promo code “Shots” to get tickets at www.bertbertbert.com

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
To Follow me on..
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
